mineclub-expanded.config.outbidsound.des: Plays a Minecraft bee death sound if someone outbids you.
mineclub-expanded.config.autogg.descript:
Makes you say gg right after the end of the game. 
§4This option is not recomended to turn on if you are a Mod+ on mineclub.
mineclub-expanded.config.outbidvolume.de: Controls the volume of the outbid sound
mineclub-expanded.config.richpresence.de:
Enables Rich Presence 
§4Requires Restarting your client.
mineclub-expanded.config.richpresence.un:
§4There was an error loading in rich presence. 
Report this to Blobanium or open an issue on mineclub expanded's issues page
§4Discord Rich Presence is not supported on Mac OS Devices
mineclub-expanded.config.autoreconnect.d:
Makes you reconnect Automatically. 
§4NOT FOR MALICIOUS USE, DO NOT USE THIS FOR MALICIOUS INTENT
mineclub-expanded.config.autoreconnectat: Sets how many attempts auto-reconnect will perform in case of a disconnection
mineclub-expanded.config.autoreconnectse: Sets how many seconds that auto reconnect will wait before reconnecting
Connects to mineclub right after minecraft starts up. 
Useful for AFK Clients that would remove the hassle to manually connect to mineclub.
Sets the custom details for the Presence
mineclub-expanded.configtext.outbid: §4The option 'Outbid Notification Sound' needs to be turned on for this option to work.
mineclub-expanded.configtext.autoreconne: §4The option 'Autoreconnect' needs to be turned on for these options to work.
mineclub-expanded.configtext.presence: §4The option 'Discord Rich Presence' needs to be turned on for this option to work.
